column4: how do I get ubuntu to detect my video card? I installed a new video card and now I can't get into X :(
it's asking me about the bus identifier for it - showing:  PCI:1:0:0
but I have an AGP one
I enter AGP and it complained :/
- I didn't buy it, I already had it in anothoer computer. :p  nvidia :)
find the right card, and use that address
the address is in hex, but X wants it in decimal
so make sure you convert it
configuring a new graphics card shouldn't be this hard.
if it's an nvidia card and you want 3D, install the nvidia drivers
